templates.name: NestJS Boilerplate
templates.description: A boilerplate for building backend applications using the NestJS framework with TypeScript, ESLint, and Prettier.

templates.name: Turborepo Boilerplate
templates.description: A highly opinionated monorepo boilerplate with TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, and more. Ideal for developers who want to quickly start working with a monorepo.

customOptions.name: scope
customOptions.message: Scope to use for the packages, e.g., `@my-org/`

templates.name: React Vite Boilerplate
templates.description: A highly opinionated React boilerplate with Vite, TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, and more. Ideal for developers who want to quickly start building applications with React.

customOptions.name: srcDir
customOptions.message: Subdirectory to put all source content (e.g., `src`, `app`). Leave blank to use the root directory.

customOptions.name: projectImportPath
customOptions.message: Import alias to use for the project, e.g., `@/`

templates.name: Web Extension React Boilerplate
templates.description: A highly opinionated WebExtension boilerplate with React, Vite, TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, and more. Ideal for developers who want to quickly start building WebExtensions.

customOptions.name: srcDir
customOptions.message: Subdirectory to put all source content (e.g., `src`, `app`). Leave blank to use the root directory.

customOptions.name: projectImportPath
customOptions.message: Import alias to use for the project, e.g., `@/`

templates.name: WebdriverIO Boilerplate
templates.description: A highly opinionated WebdriverIO boilerplate with TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, Selenoid, and more. Ideal for developers who want to quickly start writing WebdriverIO tests.

extensions.name: GitHub Setup
extensions.description: This extension adds GitHub setup to your project including GitHub Actions, Dependabot, Issue Templates, Pull Request Templates, and more.

extensions.name: GitHub Setup for User Acceptance Testing
extensions.description: This extension adds GitHub setup to your project including GitHub Actions, Dependabot, Issue Templates, Pull Request Templates, and more. It also adds a GitHub Action to run User Acceptance Tests using Selenium.
